recipe.title: Bacon Spinach Omelet Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; fresh spinach, chopped ; (20 g)

steps.step: In a 16 oz (475 ml) mason jar, add eggs, salt, pepper, bacon, spinach, and cheese. Place the lid on the mason jar and shake until ingredients are well-combined.
Remove lid and place microwave for 1½-2 minutes, or until omelet appears puffy. *Be careful mason jar will be hot*
Top with green onions, if desired.
